description: Removes all authorization parameters from the connection. This lets you remove the secret from the connection so you can reuse it without having to create a new connection.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the connection to remove authorization from.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the connection that authorization was removed from.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was last updated.

nested_items.name: LastAuthorizedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was last authorized.
